1.content:
You are a young boy at an all boys school,you see your mum off at the gate and walk into class.
You see a room full of glass jars and little,naked boys inside them,you smile at the sight.
You enter the cooking room and sit down,but first,how old are you?

11.content:
Being only 7 years old,you walk into the room and take your seat,shivering in anticipation.
A teenaged boy walks in and sits in the teacher's desk.
"Wheres the teacher?" Asked one of the students.
"He' not here today,or every will be,this is a class where teens teach you how to cook".
The class is quiet as the boy stands up and says "If you'll come through this way you will pick out your first boy".
All the class runs to the door and sees the glass jars full of boys.
"Each of the jars has the age of the boy inside,go and pick one".
